import React from "react"; import { connect } from 'react-redux'; import {Link} from "react-router-dom"; import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css'; import {smallimg} from "../../actions"; import './img.css'; class Profile extends React.Component{ constructor(props) { super(props); this.handleSubmit = this.handleSubmit.bind(this); this.state = { userId:this.props.userId, baseinfo:this.props.baseinfo } } handleSubmit(e){ let user = document } render(){ return(

Hello! {this.state.userId}!Welcome to your profile!

Upload your profile picture:

) } } const mapStateToProps = (state) => { return { userId:state.userId, baseinfo:state.baseinfo } }; export default connect(mapStateToProps)(Profile)
